hindi:
हद में चले सो मानव, बेहद चले सो साध।
हद बेहद दोनों तजे, ताको बता अगाध।
english:
Had mein chale so maanav, behad chale so sadh.
Had behad dono taje, tako bata agaadh.
translation: A man walks within boundaries, a saint walks beyond boundaries. The one who rejects both within and beyond the boundaries, becomes truly infinite.
